edu.nyu.cs.omnidroid.ui.simple
Interface FactoryDynamicUI.DlgDynamicInput

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivityDlgFilterInput
Enclosing class:
FactoryDynamicUI
public static interface FactoryDynamicUI.DlgDynamicInput

This interface must be implemented by DlgFilterInput so we can support adding dynamic UI elements to it based on the filter type chosen by the end user.

Method Summary
 void addDynamicLayout(LinearLayout ll)
          Add the constructed dynamic controls to the dialog.
 Context getContext()
          Get the dialog's context member.
 void setHandlerOnFilterInputDone(FactoryDynamicUI.InputDone handler)
          Set the handler to be called when user is done supplying information.
 void setHandlerPreserveState(FactoryDynamicUI.DlgPreserveState handler)
          Set the handler to be called for state preservation.
 void setTitle(java.lang.CharSequence title)
          Set the title of the dialog, will depend on the chosen filter/action.
